oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PGS: Life Agreements in Colombia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Suarez, Gustavo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
Markets and trade
Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Network of Organic Farmers Markets of Valley of Cauca "Food of Life" was created in 2009 as a voluntary agreement of families belonging to different organizations that share agroecology as an option that is manifested in a commitment to life, health and care of the planet.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Suarez, Gustavo (2014) PGS: Life Agreements in Colombia. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
